name: Indonesia
startIntroPart1: Honour be with you, oh great leader Soekarno, first president of Indonesia. You led the Indonesian resistance to Dutch re-colonisation efforts via diplomatic and military means until the Dutch recognition of Indonesian independence in 1949. As a result, you was given the title Father of Proclamation by the Indonesian.
startIntroPart2: Mighty leader Soekarno, the Indonesian yearn for a strong leader who can return them to prosperity! Will you set out to further expanding the glory of your nation? Will you build a civilization that can stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You stand between Indonesian army and their destiny... Prepare for war!
defeated: I'm impressed by your victory, even if it came at our expense.
introduction: You stand before the Indonesian! What brings you to our nation?
hateHello: Are you a male concubine, stranger?
tradeRequest: What if we make a deal, you and me?
uniques: [+2 Faith] <after founding a Pantheon> <before founding a religion>
[+1 Culture, +1 Happiness] [in all cities] <in cities with an enhanced religion>
Comment [+15% [Production] when constructing wonders in cities with a [Holy site]]
